name: included_items
title: Please list all additional items that you would like included with the property purchase.
label: Included Items
description: Please only list items that were not shown on the previous screen.
tips: Be specific when describing additional items. Include brand names, locations, or distinguishing features when possible.
small_print: Remember to list any mounted TVs, custom window treatments, or outdoor items like planters or furniture you'd like included. Keep in mind this is a request that you will want to discuss with the seller before submitting your offer.

suggested.hint: This field is optional, so you may leave it empty. Any input you provide will be reviewed by our Smart Buy Team and might prompt us to ask for a bit more information.

fields.name: placeholder
fields.default_value: Enter additional items to include (one per line)
